article.title: MIT Awarded $656 Million for Lincoln Laboratory Operation
article.text: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology has been awarded a $656,656,998 modification (P00532) on a cost-reimbursable, no-fee contract (FA8721-05-C-0002) for the operation of the Lincoln Laboratory Federally Funded Research and Development Center.Â Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Enterprise Acquisition Division, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
